summary: Implements the loss function used to train the Tacotron‑2 text‑to‑speech model, calculating and aggregating errors between predicted acoustic representations (mel‑spectrograms, stop‑token predictions, and post‑net outputs) and their ground‑truth targets.
business_intent: Enable effective training of high‑quality neural speech synthesis systems by providing a dedicated loss computation for Tacotron‑2, facilitating the development of voice assistants, audiobooks, and other TTS applications.
